title: [Discussion]   are 2nd years allowed to do research??? what are some of the research based clubs that 2nd years can look into??
content: i want to do something other than academics. what are the things that you (seniors) did in your 2nd year in pes and what should be your roadmap for best opportunities?

comments.body: There are a lot more details in one of my older comments (search on your own), but here is a short list of things you can do to pursue research at PES, or outside (note, list is restricted to CS): CDSAML, CCBD, IIT/NIT/IIIT summer research fellowships, reach out to profs/students/alumni pursuing good research. Its not difficult to find research opportunities, but finding good ones will be difficult.
You can check out cori in RR campus. It's in the F block basement.
